definition: to stomp or hop about (in anxiety, anger etc)/to dance on one's feet/hopping mad (anxious, etc)
to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
variant of 角[jue2]/role

sentences.english: A. I saw the boss hitting the ceiling just because he was late for 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我看有次他遲到了5分鐘，老闆就氣得跳腳了。

definition: to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
gnashing one's teeth (idiom); displaying extreme anger/fuming with rage between gritted teeth
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
righteous indignation fills one's breast (idiom); to feel indignant at injustice
to abuse roundly
to turn red (in the face)/to flush (with embarrassment or anger)
to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
variant of 小題大做|小题大做[xiao3 ti2 da4 zuo4]
to inconsiderately shout
to seethe/to sulk/to be pissed off (vulgar)
to tease a woman by pretending to be displeased with her/to flirt with a member of the opposite sex/to banter flirtatiously
to bawl out/to reprimand severely
to damn/to curse/to revile
stern voice
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
happily/giddily
